name: Fooda, Inc.
description: Provider of office lunch services intended to offer workplace food programs and support local restaurants. The company platform leverages its vertical software platform and combines it with food from local, regional, and national restaurants to provide restaurant-based meal services and top-rated restaurants that visit and serve in the office lobby or company breakroom, enabling employees to find delicious, authentic restaurants and enjoy them at work.
one_liner: Provider of office lunch services intended to offer workplace food programs and support local restaurants. The company platform leverages its vertical software platform and combines it with food from local, regional, and national restaurants to provide restaurant-based meal services and top-rated restaurants that visit and serve in the office lobby or company breakroom, enabling employees to find delicious, authentic restaurants and enjoy them at work.
